oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Centennial Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Tip Top Hill, Centennial Park, Nashville.” Color image of park with cannon and eagle monuments, lone man.

“Mrs. C. H. Patton -- 1240 Court Ave., -- Memphis -- Tenn. -- Dear Alice, -- I am having a -- nice time. I -- certainly do miss -- you. I went to the -- picture-show -- yesterday. It was -- good. Write soon -- to 810 Woodland St. -- Nashville -- Tenn. -- Love -- Louise”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial Park; parks; Nashville, Tennessee; monuments; memorials;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: C. T. American Art, Chicago; Collection processed by Angela Price
